    • Method Detail

      • fetchSaveAndApplyImageToControl

        public void fetchSaveAndApplyImageToControl()
        The method to fetch the image from the server and apply it to the control. The image is fetched and saved in the background thread. Then, the image is applied to the control in the UIThread.

      • encodeUrl

        public static java.lang.String encodeUrl(java.lang.String sUrl)

      • applyImageToControl

        public static void applyImageToControl(java.lang.Object controlObject,
                                       java.lang.String fileName,
                                       java.lang.String configName,
                                       java.util.Map imgReferenceMap,
                                       java.util.Map imgMemoryCache,
                                       org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Table tableControl,
                                       int columnIndex)
        Applies the image to the given Object. Presently Labels and TableItems are taken care of. When the image corresponding to the given key is not found, default image for the given configuration is applied to the control.
        Parameters:
        controlObject -
        fileName -
        configName -
        imgReferenceMap -
        imgMemoryCache -
        tableControl -
        columnIndex -
